p: However, the percentage content of camphor was lower in the plants cultivated on the medium supplemented with AgNPs (10 and 50 mg·dm −3). Moreover, volatile oil derived from lavender cultivated on MS medium was richer in β-pinene (3.14%), α-pinene (1.46%), p-cymene (1.39%), camphene (1.08%), and δ-3-carene (0.93%).
